definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
sentences.chinese: 刻苦練習冰球，不知用壞了多少球刀。

sentences.english: I think that word has been derogated in the media these days.
sentences.chinese: 近來，這個詞已經被媒體用壞了。

sentences.english: During the long race he burned out his brakes.
sentences.chinese: 他在那次長距離比賽中把剎車片用壞了。
